extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Graph graph)
        Initialize the validator in preparation for isValid calls. More in details it initializes the message field with a generic validation error message.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javax.validation.ConstraintValidator<Graph,Nffg>
        Parameters:
        graph - instance of Graph annotation.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Nffg graph,
              javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorContext context)
        Implement the validation of the graph against a given XSD schema.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface javax.validation.ConstraintValidator<Graph,Nffg>
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph to validate.
        context - the context in which the constraint is evaluated.
        Returns:
        true is validation has been successful, otherwise false.
        See Also:
        Nffg, ConstraintValidatorContext
